reviews.review:
不愧是随缺神一起不存在的游戏之一。

本体剧情虽然前期比较神秘，中期绕来绕去，但到了后期突然一下子找到了节奏。当一切伏笔都顺理成章地连在一起时，不得不感叹编剧的巧妙。主线之外游戏中还处处讽刺着灯塔国的发展史，让人感到心中的红旗又更加鲜艳了。除此之外，本作的美术也是十分惊艳的，属于那种贴图质量不高，但是构图非常有特色有带入感的。战斗方面，有伊丽莎白神辅助的存在，FPS菜鸡的我也能感受到社保的快感。总而言之这款游戏在剧本，美术和游戏性方面达成了很好的平衡，真的难能可贵。

9/10

（扣的一分在于战斗部分到后期比较重复）
Excellent story backed by solid gameplay.
f anna
복잡하지만 감명 깊은 스토리.

Kurgusuyla, oynanabilirliğiyle, hikayesiyle, en zevk aldığım Bioshock oyunu oldu benim için. Ek paketler de (Burial at the Sea) hikayeye ayrı bir derinlik kazandırıyor. Bu deneyim mutlaka yaşanmalı!

9/10

This is another great installment of the bioshock series, the skyhook mechanic was really fun since i love those types of mechanics the story was interesting, the designs was very good and stylized, it felt like a breathe of fresh air to the series even if they partially reversed some things, though i would've liked more free will but it hasn't been very present throughout the series though i thought it would've made sense considering quantum mechanics were heavily integrated into the story. I love the bioshock series and would like to see more, though the ending to the game was confusing. Also I would recommend everyone to get the DLC it is worth the money and it explains things like the twins you see often in the main game.

クリア済みでのレビュー。シリーズ旧2作もクリア済み。

評価点として、世界観が秀逸。旧2作よりさらに洗練され緻密になっている。キリスト教的選民思想と優性思想に染まった20世紀初頭のアメリカ人による空中独立国家、という奇抜な設定が、都市の意匠にまで表現されている。オープニング直後の都市を探索するパートでは感心した。

遊ぶ道具であるゲームとしては率直なところ退屈。ストーリーを進める会話やイベントがあり、しばらく歩くと戦闘が発生してまた会話とイベント……という一本道展開が最初から最後まで続く。とにかく物語と世界観を体験させたいという思惑が強く感じられた。

そういう作りであればこそプレイヤーを最大限遊ばせなければならない戦闘も、消極的な敵が多いことを主な原因として非常にかったるい。敵の多くが銃さえ持っていればやたら遠距離で芋りたがるアホ歩兵で、こちらから仕掛けなければ2分でも3分でも芋っている。いい位置を取るわけでもなく不用意に体は出しまくるので、かなりの戦闘が高精度の武器で遠くの人影を撃っていれば終わる。特殊能力や装備品でやれることは色々あるのだが、基本的な作りが退屈に過ぎる。シリーズ旧作の戦闘が念頭にあったので、正直唖然とした。

たぶん最大の訴求ポイントである物語は、ラストでいわゆる驚愕の展開を迎えるのだが、多元宇宙、時間ループ、記憶の改竄といった反則アイテムを山盛りぶち込んだ上での展開なので、そらどんな話にもできますわなとしか言いようがなく、評価できない。結末から遡って考えると多くの示唆が道中にあり、それを考察することも楽しまれているようだが、こういう「風呂敷を畳まずに済む前提を作って好き放題に広げた話」は好みでない。

個人的評価は、雰囲気は〇、遊び道具としては×、物語も×。決してクソゲーではないのでお勧めしないとまでは言わないが、Steamのお勧め評価は是か否かなので否を付けておく。
牛逼

Obra maestra, la música, la historia, los personajes y las armas le dan un toque muy especial. Si eres fiel a la saga Bioshock este juego es el clímax.

Después de casi 50 horas no dejo de jugar este juego, es muy bueno uno de mis favoritos.
Poor and repetitive. Crashed after 3 minutes.

Bioshock Infinite, ein Spiel was seinem Preis gerecht wird.
Eine phänomenale Storyline, eine gute konfigurierbare Grafik, und wählbarer Schwierigkeitsgrad machen 
Bioshock Infinite zu einem meiner Lieblingsspiele. Auch die Detailreiche Stadt "Columbia" mit gut programmierten 
NPC`s sorgen für ein angenehmes Spielerlebnis.
Alles in Allem ein äußerst gutes Spiel, was einen schon nach wenigen Minuten des Spielens in seinen Bann zieht!
创造出美好事物的是人，而摧毁它们的也是人。

I really liked the Bioshock game, both 1 and 2. Honestly, Infinity immediately seemed very interesting, beautiful and I expected a lot and got even more, it was especially cool how the developers made additions referring 1 part. And so to show it all on the other hand was very entertaining.
Pros:
-Story. It was a huge shock for me from the fact that we are returning to Delight again and therefore I went through everything in one breath, with great pleasure.
-Environment. THIS IS JUST SOMETHING. The picture is at the highest level, the graphics are also, especially cool that my ancient computer pulled it, although not at high settings (all advice on settings, turn off dynamic shadows and performance in your hands)
Minuses:
I personally liked everything, so no minuses.

My rating is 10 out of 10 of the great Bioshock.

Very good in some aspects and not in others.  Really enjoyed the setting, graphics, and environment.  However, the story didn't really make any sense until the end and even then it seemed like they tried too hard and left you unfulfilled.  The weapon and special ability system was nice but half of the weapons and abilities were smelly trash garbage.  Overall, good game 7/10

Buenardo.
Para los petes de reseñas negativas, si esto no es un buen juego, cual sería uno?

我没法说很推荐这个游戏，但是也建议玩 2-3 小时就可以了，后面部分可以闲暇时看实况视频或者剧情讲解。

我玩的困难模式，觉得游戏中枪战部分乐趣不大。一方面游戏里面杂景太多，有时候还有雾气，子弹在空中的痕迹也不明显，导致经常难以一时间看清楚人，被攻击掉血了还不知道敌人在哪里。这也间接导致枪战时基本只能慢慢露头看人来点，异能的利用率也不高。这种模式就很难获得 FPS 的快感。另外一方面是游戏剧情过于晦涩。因为英语听不懂，导致对剧情的理解很靠字幕，而看字幕的同时又要走路又要看收集品，所以打了很久也不知道游戏在说什么。后面看了剧情解读才大致明白。最后就是收集要素实在太烦，要升级就得不停找银币，到处按 F 实在无趣。还要捡各种食物回血，弄个慢速自动回血不就好了。

很多人提到的加分点是伊丽莎白，但是以现在（2019 年）的技术水平来看，伊丽莎白已经并不是那么生动可爱了。

但是我觉得游戏的整体素质还是很高的。看看哥伦比亚城，体验下滑轨飞行，打打枪扔扔技能听听配乐，也是不错的体验。

优点：
- 哥伦比亚城实在太美了
- 剧情丰富、世界观详尽
- 配乐好评，视听体验上素质极高

缺点：
- 打架时经常看不到人，被莫名攻击，困难模式下打枪体验一般（当然也是我技术差）
- 收集要素比较烦人
- 钥匙解箱子很不值，就一点钱
Нет слов просто. Это лучшая игра всей серии. Офигенно!

Este fue mi juego favorito del 2013. Si, me gusto mas que incluso The Last of Us y GTA V, así de mucho.

BioShock hayalgücünün sınırlarını zorlayan bir başyapıt. Atmosferi cenneti andırır, ufkunuzu genişletir, müzikleri ise o atmosferi yaşamanıza olanak sağlar. Alın, oynayın ve sonunda "OHA" diyeceğiniz, kafanızı cayır cayır yakacak bir hikayeyi, klasik müzik eşliğinde çatışmaya girmenin keyfini doya doya yaşayın. Biraz spoiler gibi olacak ama [spoiler]Vox Populi ile devrim yaptığınız bölüm[/spoiler] sizi aşırı gaza getirebilir. Ayrıca oyunda var olan kineteskop, voksofon gibi teknolojik detaylar da daha keyifli hale getiriyor. 

Ve elbette Elizabeth... Bir oyun karakterinden çok daha fazlası. 

Bu oyun hakkında hangi yorumu yaparsak yapalım, hep bir parça eksik kalıyor. Öyle güzel bir oyun işte, ancak yine de oynadığım en güzel oyun diyemem.

Puan: 9/10

Son olarak: Ne yaparsanız yapın ama 77 sayısını asla geçmeyin.

Seriously, just play this game. It was sitting on my library for quite some time and I regret not playing it sooner. The plot is absolutely mind-blowingly good - and that comes from a man who had his fair share of games, anime, and TV shows. 

Don't resist. There's no use in doing so. After all, you've already played it; you - and all the versions of yourself in a million, million worlds.

게임이 시작되기전 처음 보여주는 마을의 압도적인 영상미 하나만은 절대 잊을 수 없는게임.

마지막 엔딩은 처음봤을 떈 잘 이해가 안되서 검색해서 찾아봤는데 [spoiler]난수고정된 평행이론[/spoiler]이 전제로 되어있다는것을 이해해야 이 게임의 스토리를 제대로 이해할 수 있다.

그리고 총알도 챙겨줘, 노래도 잘불러줘, 귀엽고 이쁘기까지한 엘리자베스는 어디 성형안한 ㅃㅃㅇ보다는 백만배는 천사니 앨리자베스를 보기만 해도 이 게임을 할 가치가 있습니다.

단연코 예술작품이라 생각되오니 꼭하세요.

분명 엘리자베스 이미지에선 이뻣는데 
게임에선 아이클레이냐

Очень трудно не быть многословным при комментировании этой игры, но я постараюсь.
 1 Геймплей. Почему нельзя брать больше двух стволов? Это крайне не удобно при огромном количестве оружия в этой игре.Крайне мало стелса. Если не обращать внимания на эти два пункта, то это играбельно.
 2 Графика и стилистика стимпанка великолепны.
 3 Повествование истории и раскрытие персонажей очень хороши.
 4 Но сам сюжет игры, это какой-то один огромный феспалм.
Я не понимаю, зачем было лезть во всю эту игру с путешествиями в другие миры, если из-за этого гарантировано появляются огромные дыры в сюжете?
P.S Буду честен, мне в падлу сейчас пересказывать весь сюжет и раскрывать проблему из-за которой весь сюжет игры превращается в бессмыслицу, поэтому просто гляньте обзор этой игры на канале Metalyst и вы сами все поймете.

Bioshock Infinite is one of the most memorable and enjoyable experiences I have had in a while, and has quickly become one of my favorite games. The devs took the original elements of Bioshock and have crafted an entirely unique game. The gripping, sometimes haunting atmosphere reminds me of the original games, and although this isn't a direct sequel, the tie-ins are appreciated. I can't recommend this game enough, if you haven't played it for yourself, get it now, you will not be let down. Although you may want to wait for a sale, as sixty bucks (all content/DLC included in that number) is a bit steep for a twenty or so hour game, no matter how great it is. Again, go play Bioshock Infinite for yourself, it is a 10/10 in my book.

So let's just get this right out of the way, this is not Bioshock. Don't take that as this isn't a good game, quite the opposite, i was actually massive surprised how much i liked this game and how quickly i became attached to the story of Booker Dewitt and Elizabeth. I'll be honest, the only reason i own and played this game is because i bought the Bioshock collection on sale, originally only to replay the first two games. I did actually love playing this game, but it is in many ways the polar opposite of Rapture. Columbia, the new main city, is a bright and sunny steampunk inspired city floating in the clouds, filled with a post-civil war america architecture and clothing style, and the higher class of educated citizens, it is a far leap from the drug addicted splicers of rapture living in the dank and dark remnants of the once utopian art-deco Rapture. Infact, Columbia almost seems to actually spit in the face of Andrew Ryan, being Ruled and led by a religious zealot, and citizens worship former heads of government openly in the street. Ultimately, This is still a great game, and has fairly similar gameplay, with a few differences, such as the skyhook combat, and only being able to carry 2 guns, but even though it does make a short reference to rapture near the end of the game, It is a story in it's own right, and had nothing to do with the first two games.
Una obra maestra de principio a fin. Recomendado 10/10

Сюжет 123 Элизабет из 10

В целом, можно много говорить об игре. И все в положительных качествах. Прошел игру один раз за 10 часов, и, честно, не нашел к чему можно прикопаться. 
Основной упор игры был сделан на сюжет, и это бросается сразу. Поэтому говорить только о нем можно много. Нас не кидают в гущу событий и не подгоняют очередью из автомата, а постепенно и аккуратно вводят в историю.По завершению сюжетной компании осталось много вопросов, непонятных моментов, хотя игра прямым текстом многое объясняла. Финал вызвал у меня бурю эмоций и желание перепройти игру ради истории еще раз. На разных форумах есть объяснение сюжета и финала, в частности. После их прочтения впечатления от игры только усиливаются. Ты понимаешь насколько оригинальна, уникальна эта игра в плане проработки, абсолютно, всех мелочей....///
Гениальный сюжет и прекрасная игра!

Well, I'll begin this by saying that this doesn't cost full price. Get it on sale.

This is quite a hard game to review. Everyone's emotional associations to this game are different. I'll try to hit the [i]facts[/i] as shortly as possible.

This is a short game. I finished it in 12 hours, with about half an hour afk. It will take you about 15 or so hours to 100% this game. Then you can start a new game on the hardcore '1999' mode. All in all about 30 hours worth of content. Oh, and there's DLC that I didn't get. 

The gameplay is well, fun. Although I chose hard mode for my first (and only) playthrough, the battles and bosses weren't all that hard, especially when you figure out what to do and how to use the vigors properly. To be honest, this game seemes to be a chore almost, but a fun chore at that.

The story is... existent, so that's a pro. 

Everything that can be said about this game has been said already. I'm just expressing my own opinion as shortly as possible.

On sale, this game is a must-have. The gameplay is fun, the story existent, overall a solid [h1]9/10[/h1]

久仰生化奇兵大名，这次跳过了销魂城，直接来哥伦比亚欣赏天空之城的美。
游戏的剧情复杂华丽而又引人入胜，是那种可以一口气玩到底的体验，一周目只了解了大概，可玩性还是不错的。
美工方面不多说，第九艺术代表可不是白说的，开阔的天空之城场景，混合古典建筑风格和未来科技蒸汽朋克风格，虽不是写实画风但到处都充满着细节，吹就完事。
射击手感尚可，不过键位要自己设定一下，按键盘开镜还是太难受了，建议鼠标右键开镜，中键释放技能，用手柄当我没说。
队友的AI堪称一绝，伊丽莎白的存在直接影响了游戏中期的体验，开高难度的情况下没有她的辅助还真打不过去。
最后引用来自知乎的一句话：“玩了其他的大作，你可能会记住那是个不错的游戏，而玩了生化奇兵，你一定会记住这是个无与伦比的好故事”
经典classic
말이 필요없는 명작

The first time I played this game, I was amazed at the story. I am not a very good shooter player. I thought that the first Bioshock was one of the greatest stories I've ever played. Bioshock Infinite had an in-game story that was compelling and had many elements that made me want to keep going. The music was fascinating, the world building intriguing, the art style great. The mechanics of the game were nothing that improved upon the previous games in my opinion. I recently game back to the game to play the DLC and played the original story again. The second playthrough was much less satisfying. I suppose any time you deal with time, some of the logic gets fuzzy. Burial at Sea added additional story components that did not positively add to my experience. I thought that the first episode cheapened Bioshock Infinite. I felt that the second attempted to fix the problems with the first. My feeling at the end was that the entire thing was pointless. I'd say play Infinite if you liked Bioshock, I would skip the DLC, however.

Обожаю главных героев, которые оказываются в хуeвой ситуации или странном месте, и такие: "вау..." "какого...", а потом пускают шутейки будто так быть и должно, подумаешь город летает, обычное дело в Казахстане.

Стрельба и анимации напоминают boderlands, а атмосфера пусть и светлее чем в предыдущих частях, но местами все ровно гнетет. Лично для меня вторая часть лучшая в плане логичности действий и мотивов главного героя. Так, геймплейно и визуально игра неплоха, даже хороша, но иной раз ахyеваешь когда спутница кидает тебе монетку в eбало через стену. 7,7/10

Rozhodně palec hore.
Tentokrát vás další díl hry Bioshock zavede do nebe místo podvodního světa.
Dost zajímavá změna , která této hře jen prospěla.
Je to volné pokračování, nenavazuje to , odehrává se to ještě před BioShockem 1,
v roce 1912.
Co se týče děje, příběh dost zajímavý, fakt se do toho zažerete, a je možné že si občas budete klást pár otázek ohledně děje.
Grafika je dost úchvatná, dobře zpracované textury.
Herní doba podobná jako u původního Bioshocku.
Na nejtěžší obtížnost jsem se vešel akorát do 12 hodin, takže mi to vyšlo pěkně.

9 z 10.

Having just finished this game, I have to say I expect it to stick with me for a long time. Throughout the game the adventure does feel a little bit like a large amount of side quests, but that is needed to tell the story they wanted to.

I loved the story and the skyline ideas. The skyline drop attacks are so much fun to use. Although a very basic combat system, it becomes more advanced as the game progresses. The city feels really filled out, and some of the scenery and settings are insanely beautiful 

Spoilers (small ones):
I felt the last vigor was given far to anti-climatically and the shock vigor was  a huge pointless (in my opinion) side quest, though I enjoyed it.

Let me start off by saying that FPSes are not normally my type of game (I generally stick to strategy games). Because of that, I can't tell you about whether the cover system is as great as Gears of War's or whatever, although I didn't have a problem with anything in combat (for the record, I played on Easy Mode and haven't gone on to play the DLC yet, though that will be happening soon).

What I can tell you about is story. This game stunned me. The way in which this game's story was told stunned me. Every theme, every scrap of dialogue, every song, perfect. You get a sense of a complete world that functions without you from the very first moments of the game and little details that serve the story in interesting ways and fill out the world are everywhere. 

As someone who knows a fair amount about US history (although I'd never claim to be an expert), they get certain bits of the period just right. For instance, one of the villains, a jovial yet irredeemably evil industrialist, is reminiscent of a cross between the robber barons Edison, Carnegie, and Pullman. It all works.

Returning to gameplay, an issue I have with games like these sometimes is direction. I sometimes can't figure out which way to go. The navigation button was something I used often, and, although a bit confusing, I got the hang of it quickly. This went some way towards mitigating a confusing moment or two. I had a brief issue figuring out where to go next in a large chasm criss-crossed with Skylines (think roller-coasters with you as the car), for instance, but I figured it out quickly.

That's just an incredibly minor nitpick, though. This game is deeply, deeply cool, but it's more than that. It is art, and don't let anyone tell you otherwise.
MUHTEŞEM!

Penso si possa definire la quadratura del cerchio di questa fantastica trilogia. Il primo capitolo mi ha letteralmente catturato, il secondo è stato bello, ha continuato quello che è stato iniziato nel primo ma non mi ha entusiasmato come avrei voluto. Poi arriva il terzo capitolo. Già dal trailer sembra un'ottima boccata d'aria fresca. Poi lo inizio a giocare e diventa tutto chiaro. Questo non è un gioco, questo è un CAPOLAVORO! Da portare fino alla fine tutto d'un fiato fino a che la scena finale chiude la storia in un modo che potrei definire epico, anche se non è abbastanza. Se non avete ancora giocato questo capitolo della saga DOVETE assolutamente farlo. Se non avete giocato nessun capitolo della saga, bhe, cosa state aspettando??

A direção de arte do jogo não falha em surpreender os jogadores com seus cenário muito bem feitos e criados de maneira super criativa, cidades flutuantes, interiores de fábricas e mansões dos EUA no século XVIII.
O combate do jogo se diversifica com a combinação de poderes especiais, ataques corpo-a-corpo e armas de fogo.
A história é totalmente linear e com certo nível de complexidade para se entender completamente os fatos apresentados, porém é difícil se perder e deixar de entender a trama principal em seus detalhes mais simples.

永远忘不掉的伊丽莎白，永远忘不掉的Will the Circle BeUnbroken。
剧情非常优秀，隐晦而并不复杂，在一定程度上探究了极权主义，宗教信仰，贫富悬殊，对底层工人的剥削等社会议题，并且糅合了当下所流行的平行世界、量子力学等要素，却没有明显的逻辑错误，这一点显得难能可贵。画面色彩丰富，魔法加上枪械的战斗方式提供了更多的可能与趣味性。除了有容易让一部分人头晕的短板之外，《生化奇兵：无限》的确是第九艺术的代表作品之一。
